body_html: Looks like the graph transform tool binary is quite large and has significantly increased our pip package size(+ 80MB). Unfortunately we will need to revert the change for graph transform tool. freeze_graph will still be available through command line.
body_text: Looks like the graph transform tool binary is quite large and has significantly increased our pip package size(+ 80MB). Unfortunately we will need to revert the change for graph transform tool. freeze_graph will still be available through command line.
body: Looks like the graph transform tool binary is quite large and has significantly increased our pip package size(+ 80MB). Unfortunately we will need to revert the change for graph transform tool. `freeze_graph` will still be available through command line.
